title: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner 'call off divorce as they decide to give relationship another go'
text:
Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner 'call off divorce as they decide to give relationship another go' The couple announced they were separating in 2015 Share Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck have 'called off their divorce' (Photo: Splash/Getty) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner are reportedly calling off their divorce and giving their relationship another go. 
The actors, both 44, announced their separation in June 2015, and while they aren't officially back together, they've decided to keep working on their marriage, according to People . 
The pair have reportedly made the decision after going through a rough patch that nearly led to a permanent split. 
A source told the magazine: " Jen has called off the divorce. She really wants to work things out with Ben. They are giving things another try." Read More Jennifer Garner 'to divorce Ben Affleck' two years after announcing their breakup They announced their separation in 2015 (Photo: AFP/Getty) 
The mag also reports that a source close to the couple said if was a decision they both made. 
"There is always a chance of reconciliation," they said. 
"They love each other. They also really, really love their kids, and those kids love their parents." 
A source added that Jen had originally wanted to file for divorce in order to "move on" and focus on the "happy things" in her life, and that she was "exhausted" from all the ups and downs.
